document_data.mainbody:
Hasantasser Bloodshoulder was a jovial thief and innkeep inhabiting Tilverton in the .
Hasantasser ran Grimwalds Revengeâ€“a nice but expensive inn that seemed to have a problem with frogs. He was also a member of the Rogues of Tilverton.
Hasantasser actually kept pet frogs. He released one within the inn every time the Rogues pulled off a successful heist. Some of his frogs had yellow markings, alerting fellow Rogues in distress that they could use the small packet of dust of disappearance secured to the frogs belly.
